rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with traditional Kerala motifs and a small waiting area. Includes a water feature for tranquility.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space combining living, dining, and kitchen areas with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light. Incorporates traditional Kerala woodwork and stone finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet traditionally inspired open-plan kitchen featuring state-of-the-art amenities integrated seamlessly with the dining and living area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed for restful sleep, incorporating Vastu principles such as south-east corner placement to promote prosperity. Includes a built-in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living space for domestic help with essential amenities and a small bathroom.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility Room
rooms.description: A dedicated room for storage of household items, ensuring adherence to Vastu by placing it in the north-west corner.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, adhering to Kerala style aesthetics with traditional wooden frames.
Traditional wooden door fitted with modern locking mechanisms for security while maintaining cultural design elements.
